name: ALBANIAN ROAD SAFETY COUNCIL
headAddress: str. Ismail Qemali , Pall Samos Tower
goal:
ARSC is a NGO that has started its activity in 2013 aiming to
promote programs and activities that raise public awareness
on accidents prevention, improvement of road safety,
recovering plans for natural disasters etc.
 The frightening statistics of the lives lost as well as severely
injuries caused by road accidents urged a group of
professionals with an extended and successful experience in
the insurance, automotive and various business field to came together to contribute and make a difference on road safety.The Council is operating as an implementer and coordinator
for all activities related with road safety, increase awareness
programs for road safety, natural disasters, recovering plans,
preventions of accidents etc.
 ARSC is promoting programs to prevent different types of
accidents partnering with respective Ministries,
Municipalities, national and international insurance agencies,
NGOs, and other important stakeholders in Albania, Kosovo and Macedonia.
